title: Mirror of Germany. No. 135 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Newspapers in education

description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: King Hussein of Morocco visits Germany; Thomas Mann, author of the epic novel "Buddenbrookes", visits Lubeck prior to his death; a Buddenbrookes Museum has now been established there; a survey of 800 student newspapers printed in Germany; examines projects in Ghana; George Ballantynes' version of the Nutcracker Suite has its European premiere in Cologne Opera House.
